definition: seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)

sentences.english: The national flags of the two countries were flying at the square in front of the Presidential Palace which was built in the 16th century.
sentences.chinese: 始建於16世紀的總統府廣場上飄揚着中阿兩國國旗。

sentences.english: That night the French presidential palace issued a carefully worded statement.
sentences.chinese: 法國總統府當晚發表了一份措辭嚴謹的聲明。

sentences.english: The pictures shows the new office building view inside and outside.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲馬裏總統府辦公樓外景和內景。

sentences.english: Talabani's office later denied he said this.
sentences.chinese: 塔拉巴尼總統府稍後否認有過此類說法。

sentences.english: Soldiers had seized the building a few hours before.
sentences.chinese: 馬達加斯加軍人一度佔領這座總統府幾個小時。

sentences.english: Clusters of lit candles flicker outside the presidential palace where mourners are still leaving flowers.
sentences.chinese: 總統府外燭光搖曳，悼念者還在那裏擺放了鮮花。

sentences.english: The presidential palace has seemed quite elegant, solemn without affectation.
sentences.chinese: 總統府好像還是挺典雅的，莊重而不做作。

sentences.english: Recipients will receive their awards at the Istana on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 得獎者將在這個星期天於總統府獲頒獎項。

sentences.english: Many other people have lined up outside the Istana, where a book of condolence has been placed.
sentences.chinese: 很多人在總統府外排起了長隊，等待在弔唁簿上簽名。

sentences.english: The national palace and the headquarters of the United Nations mission in Haiti also collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 海地總統府和聯合國海地特派團總部都因強震倒塌。

sentences.english: Protestersbuilt barricades and tried to use garbage cans as battering rams tobreak their way into thenational palace.
sentences.chinese: 抗議者堆起路障，試着用垃圾桶當槌以攻入總統府。

sentences.english: He said he was lightly wounded in the attack on his compound, adding that seven people had been killed.
sentences.chinese: 他說，他在總統府遇襲時受輕傷，另外有七人遇難。

sentences.english: Thabo Mbeki was guarded in his comments after meeting with Laurent Gbagbo at the presidential residence.
sentences.chinese: 姆貝基在總統府與巴波會晤之後沒有發表任何評論。

sentences.english: It's a great spot to watch the monthly changing-of-guards ceremony at the Istana.
sentences.chinese: 它是觀禮每月一次的總統府衛兵換班儀式的勝地。

sentences.english: The proof is in the parking lot at the presidential palace in Dakar.
sentences.chinese: 相關證據就在達喀爾總統府的停車場裏。

sentences.english: As Mr Berlusconi arrived at the palace, a large crowd booed and jeered.
sentences.chinese: 當貝盧斯科尼到達總統府時，人羣爆出噓聲和嘲笑聲。

definition: Ma Ying-jeou (1950-), Taiwanese Kuomintang politician, Mayor of Taipei 1998-2006, president of Republic of China 2008-2016
Green Standard Army, standing infantry during Qing dynasty, originally formed from Ming and other Chinese army units
DPP (Democratic Progressive Party, Taiwan)/abbr. for 民主進步黨|民主进步党
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
